name: geshi101meta
heading: A module applying 'geshi' to files in 101repo according to 101meta matches

issues.getstatusoutput: Does not work on windows (and may be some *nix) because of the use of getstatusoutput that seems to be non portable. See http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1535672/how-to-interpret-status-code-in-python-commands-getstatusoutput for instance, or https://github.com/victorporof/Sublime-HTMLPrettify/issues/12
